mapper.select: SELECT R1.*, IFNULL(RESULT, 'null') RESULT FROM (SELECT REVIEW_NO, CONTENT, SATISFIED, CREATE_DATE, R.STATUS, MEMBER_ID FROM REVIEW R, MEMBER M WHERE R.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO AND AGENT_NO = #{agentNo} AND R.STATUS = 'Y') R1 LEFT JOIN REMOVE_REQUEST RQ ON R1.REVIEW_NO = RQ.REVIEW_NO ORDER BY R1.REVIEW_NO DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REMOVE_REQUEST(REQUEST_NO, AGENT_NO, REVIEW_NO, REASON) VALUES(SEQ_REQ.NEXTVAL, #{agentNo}, #{reviewNo}, #{reason})
